Pope Francis has been quoted in a soon-to-be published book saying that having gay people in the clergy "is something that worries me" and remarking that some societies are considering homosexuality a "fashionable" lifestyle. item.title: Pope lets young boy roll around on Vatican stage - ABC News
item.description:
Pope lets young boy roll around on Vatican stage  ABC News

A young boy has hilariously upstaged Pope Francis at the Vatican as he went on stage and rolled around the floor during the weekly general audience. He also took a keen interest towards the colourful Swiss guard on the platform. Pope Francis was addressing the packed hall as the boy freely walked up the marble stairs towards him. The child broke through security and went to pull on the sleeve of a Swiss guard on the podium, just metres from the Pope, it appeared as if he was checking to see if the guard was real.
